links.description: Grade Last Price % Change Price Change 193.53 1.11% 2.12 AAPL closed up 1.11 percent on Friday, November 16, 2018, on approximately normal volume. Its advance stalled at its 200 day moving average, an important long-term support / resistance line. Due to the stock's strong downtrend, it may remain oversold for a while.
